TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemFonts extends System.Object
public ref class SystemFonts abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含公开有关字体的系统资源的属性。

span.span: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

summary.span: 获取规格，它确定非最小化窗口的非工作区标题的字体系列。

span.span: Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
